    • Uses of TriggerPolicy in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable.operator

      Methods in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable.operator with parameters of type TriggerPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void WindowInvokable.processFakeElement(Object input, TriggerPolicy<IN> currentPolicy)
      This method processed an arrived fake element The method is synchronized to ensure that it cannot interleave with WindowInvokable.processRealElement(Object)
      Method parameters in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable.operator with type arguments of type TriggerPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void WindowInvokable.emitFinalWindow(List<TriggerPolicy<IN>> centralTriggerPolicies)
      This method does the final reduce at the end of the stream and emits the result.
      protected void WindowInvokable.externalTriggerFakeElement(IN input, List<TriggerPolicy<IN>> policies)
      This method gets called in case of an grouped windowing in case central trigger occurred and the arriving element causing the trigger is not part of this group.
      protected void WindowInvokable.processRealElement(IN input, List<TriggerPolicy<IN>> triggerPolicies)
      This method processed an arrived real element The method is synchronized to ensure that it cannot interleave with WindowInvokable#processFakeElement(Object).
      Constructor parameters in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.invokable.operator with type arguments of type TriggerPolicy 
      Constructor and Description

      This constructor creates an instance of the grouped windowing invokable.

      This constructor created a windowing invokable using trigger and eviction policies.

    • Uses of TriggerPolicy in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.policy

      Subinterfaces of TriggerPolicy in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.policy 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ActiveTriggerPolicy<DATA>
      This interface extends the TriggerPolicy interface with functionality for active triggers.
      interface  CloneableTriggerPolicy<DATA>
      When used in GroupedWindowInvokable, trigger policies can provide a clone method.
      Classes in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.policy that implement TriggerPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountTriggerPolicy<IN>
      This policy triggers at every n'th element.
      class  DeltaPolicy<DATA>
      This policy calculates a delta between the data point which triggered last and the currently arrived data point.
      class  PunctuationPolicy<IN,DATA>
      This policy can be used to trigger and evict based on a punctuation which is present within the arriving data.
      class  TimeTriggerPolicy<DATA>
      This trigger policy triggers with regard to the time.
